sourcesContent: import { useStyles } from "./styles"; import { Grid, Typography, Paper } from '@material-ui/core'; function Stats({ planet }) { const classes = useStyles(); return ( <> rotation time {planet.map(el => el.rotation)} revolution time {planet.map(el => el.revolution)} radius {planet.map(el => el.radius)} average temp {planet.map(el => el.temperature)} ) } export default Stats
